statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT experiment_id, sales_amount FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT pricing_variant, customer_behavior FROM pricing_strategies WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT experiment_id, pricing_variant FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY pricing_variant DESC;
SELECT pricing_variant, sales_amount FROM pricing_strategies WHERE experiment_id = 1 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE sales_amount > 1000 AND customer_behavior LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY pricing_variant ASC, experiment_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT pricing_variant, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY pricing_variant ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT strategy_name, price, start_date FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, strategy_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND sale_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE price > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, price, start_date, end_date FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.strategy_id, s.strategy_name, s.price, sd.sale_amount, sd.sale_date FROM pricing_strategy s INNER JOIN sales_data sd ON s.strategy_id = sd.strategy_id WHERE sd.sale_amount > 500;
SELECT strategy_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY strategy_id HAVING total_sales > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, pricing_model FROM pricing_strategies
SELECT customer_id, timestamp, total_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'loyalty' LIMIT 10
SELECT strategy_name, pricing_model FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_id ASC
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT sale_id, timestamp, customer_id, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name FROM pricing_strategies WHERE pricing_model = 'subscription' ORDER BY strategy_name;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT strategy_id, sales_impact, customer_behavior FROM experiment_results ORDER BY sales_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, base_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT strategy_id, SUM(sales_impact) AS total_impact FROM experiment_results GROUP BY strategy_id ORDER BY total_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, customer_id, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT test_id, variation_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM ab_test_results WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT strategy_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Discount%' OR strategy_name LIKE 'Sale%' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, strategy_name, price, start_date, end_date FROM pricing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC, start_date ASC LIMIT 3

SELECT p.id, p.strategy_name, s.product_id, s.sale_date FROM pricing_strategies p JOIN sales_data s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10 AND s.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-31' ORDER BY p.id ASC, s.sale_date DESC

SELECT c.customer_id, c.behavior_type, b.behavior_description FROM customer_behavior b JOIN customer_behavior c ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC, b.behavior_date DESC LIMIT 5
